title: Hides (4R19)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may draw a card. Response: If a [Dunland] Man is about to take a wound, remove (2) or discard this possession to prevent that wound.
Lore:	Only heavy animal skins armored the Dunlendings.
Rarity:	R
